types:type.name: add
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type add = {| sno: String, transid: String, order: {| orderHeader: {| orderNumber: String, orderQty: String, totalCost: String, cardName: String, operation: String, orderLines: Array<{| lineNo: String, lineQty: Number {"typeId": "int"}, lineCost: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}> |} |} |} {"example": "{\\\"sno\\\":\\\"4\\\",\\\"transid\\\":\\\"04444\\\",\\\"order\\\":{\\\"orderHeader\\\":{\\\"orderNumber\\\":\\\"0123456\\\",\\\"orderQty\\\":\\\"6\\\",\\\"totalCost\\\":\\\"3000\\\",\\\"cardName\\\":\\\"AXIS\\\",\\\"operation\\\":\\\"create\\\",\\\"orderLines\\\":[{\\\"lineNo\\\":\\\"1111\\\",\\\"lineQty\\\":1,\\\"lineCost\\\":1000},{\\\"lineNo\\\":\\\"2222\\\",\\\"lineQty\\\":2,\\\"lineCost\\\":2000},{\\\"lineNo\\\":\\\"3333\\\",\\\"lineQty\\\":3,\\\"lineCost\\\":3000},{\\\"lineNo\\\":\\\"4444\\\",\\\"lineQty\\\":4,\\\"lineCost\\\":4000}]}}}"}
